name: Perry Michael ENGEL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Engel v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Perry Michael ENGEL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of June, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
857 A.2d 672
Perry Michael ENGEL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 4, 2004.
